channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 77 Edmonton Zone 53 South Zone 18 Central Zone 20 North Zone 35 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Apr 27, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 13193 102 VOC Percentage 63% -0.168% Total VOC cases 27921 1058 Total VOC recovered 14647 953 Total deaths from VOC 81 3 VOC specimens screened 53051 1396 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Tue, Apr 27, 2021
